summary: In Hollywood, California, Cool Cat, alongside his human father Daddy Derek, embarks on his most challenging journey yet: saving the kids from Butch the Bully. Can he do it?
cast: Vivica A. Fox|Erik Estrada|Derek Savage|Connor Dean|Angel Hope|Jessica R. Salazar|Laura McKenzie|April Ann Reese|Lisa Salazar|Jennifer Kersey|Madison Marie Steinacker|Mikee Loria|Connor Gallagher|Sean Talbott|Sergio Blanco|Anita Marie Curran|Steve Crest|Blair Wright|Bill Hall|Jason Johnson|April Berry|Starwil Reed|Daniel Gable
title: Cool Cat Saves the Kids
